original_title: ハロー!モーニング。ハロモ二。劇場 Vol.4「昼下がりのモーママたち&バスがくるまで」
overview: Fourth and final to include "Bus ga Kuru Made" skits, and the only one to contain "Hirusagari no Moomamatachi" skits. The segments were originally aired from October 2002 through March 2003.
title: Hello! Morning Haromoni Gekijou Vol.4 "Hirusagari no Moomamatachi & Bus ga Kuru Made"
